title: Help Omeluum Investigate the Parasite
content:
Lovely. So where do I find these mushrooms? That's too risky of an experiment for me. Count me out. Leave.

Choosing dialogue 2 will have Blurg explain where you can find them, and who you can talk to for the items. This will give you the following dialogue options.

Why would a cleric have a bunch of dangerous mushrooms? Where does this Lenore live? All right. I'll come back when I find the mushrooms. Good to know. I have other priorities right now. Leave.

Choosing dialogue 2 will have Blurg
